trans-unit.source: Enables <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: Habilita controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outros controles de servidor a conterem coleções de verbos.

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Um verbo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles é uma ação que um usuário pode executar na interface do usuário (IU).

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um verbo é representado na interface de usuário por um controle clicável como um botão, um link ou um item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controles de Web Parts fornece verbos padrão que estão disponíveis por padrão para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles e outros controles de servidor (como custom, ASP.NET e o usuário controla) que pode agir como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controla quando colocada em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zonas.

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: Verbos padrão incluem fechar, minimizam, restauram, excluir, editem e exportam.

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode criar verbos personalizados para uso com <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> e controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, com seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade fornece uma maneira para integrar os verbos personalizados em controles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface e implementa sua única propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar verbos personalizados a um controle que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe, você deve substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, adicionar verbos personalizados a uma coleção e retorna a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A coleção referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade contém somente os verbos personalizados; verbos padrão não são incluídos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Padrão retornam o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle é `null`, porque por padrão não sem verbos personalizados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar verbos personalizados para controles de servidor que não são <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles requer uma etapa extra.

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, os controles também devem implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> de interface e implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar verbos personalizados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> coleção, o controle de Web Parts definido automaticamente trata as etapas necessárias para criar e processar os verbos personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a simple implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra uma implementação simples do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example shows how the interface is implemented in a user control.
trans-unit.target: A primeira parte do exemplo de código mostra como a interface é implementada em um controle de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The user control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property by creating two custom verbs and defining a method that is called when a user clicks either of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: O controle de usuário implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade criando dois verbos personalizados e definir um método que é chamado quando um usuário clica em um dos verbos.

trans-unit.source: For simplicity, the same method is used for both verbs.
trans-unit.target: Para simplificar, o mesmo método é usado para ambos os verbos.

trans-unit.source: The method updates the value of a property named `VerbCounterClicks`.
trans-unit.target: O método atualiza o valor de uma propriedade chamada `VerbCounterClicks`.

trans-unit.source: The code for the `Page_Load` method accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Verbs%2A> property of the control to display the total count of custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código para o `Page_Load` método acessa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Verbs%2A> propriedade do controle para exibir a contagem total de verbos personalizados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This count does not include the standard Web Parts verbs.
trans-unit.target: Essa contagem não inclui os verbos de Web Parts padrão.

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo tem uma caixa de texto que aceita a entrada do usuário, que é uma possível ameaça à segurança.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a páginas da Web ASP.NET validam a entrada do usuário não inclui elementos HTML ou script.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de explorações de script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is an .aspx page that hosts the user control.
trans-unit.target: A segunda parte do exemplo de código é uma página. aspx que hospeda o controle de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Because the control is referenced in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, at run time ASP.NET wraps the user control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control and treats it as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle é referenciada em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controle em tempo de execução ASP.NET envolve o controle de usuário em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controlar e tratá-la como um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, notice that the label at the bottom of the control displays how many custom verbs are in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Depois de carregar a página em um navegador, observe que o rótulo na parte inferior do controle exibe quantos verbos personalizados estão na coleção referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.Verbs%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Also note that if you click the verbs menu in the control, and click either of the verbs, another label appears showing the total number of times the custom verbs have been clicked.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que, se você clicar no menu de verbos no controle e clique em qualquer um dos verbos, outro rótulo aparece mostrando o número total de vezes que os verbos personalizados clicados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência a uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> personalizados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> that contains custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" /> que contém a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade referencia uma coleção de verbos personalizados (se houver) que são adicionados a um menu de verbos no cabeçalho de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou outro controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> a coleção não contém referências ao padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> definir objetos fornecidos com o controle de Web Parts, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que desejam adicionar verbos personalizados para um personalizado de controle que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe simplesmente pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> propriedade que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> classe implementa.

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que desejam adicionar verbos personalizados a um controle de usuário ou um controle personalizado que não é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlar, deve implementar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface fornecendo uma implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property as implemented in a user control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade conforme implementado em um controle de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The full code for this code example can be found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: O código completo para este exemplo de código pode ser encontrado na seção exemplo de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> tópico de visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The following portion of the code example demonstrates a custom implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property within a user control.
trans-unit.target: A parte seguinte do exemplo de código demonstra uma implementação personalizada do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> propriedade dentro de um controle de usuário.
